title: Fact-checking Trump's 'impressive numbers' claim
description: CNN's Kate Bolduan analyzes President Donald Trump's recent White House press briefings saying the "rosy picture" he is painting doesn't align with recent coronavirus numbers.

title: Durian fruit: A smell so rotten, a taste so sweet
description: Durian has been described as the most foul-smelling fruit in the world. Its aroma has been compared to raw sewage, rotting flesh and smelly gym socks. Durian's smell is so pungent that the spiky-skinned, custard-like fruit is even banned from public places in Singapore and Malaysia. But for its fans, there is nothing better in this world.

title: Another airline has just bid farewell to the 747
description: After 50 years of flying, Qantas' last remaining Boeing 747 passenger jet departed Australia for the final time on Wednesday and left a special message for everyone in the sky — a drawing of the airline's iconic kangaroo logo.

title: Video appears to show paper-burning at Chinese consulate
description: CNN affiliate KPRC obtained video that appears to show a fire at the Chinese consulate after the US ordered them to evacuate. CNN's Alex Marquardt reports.

title: CNN anchor fact-checks congressman: 'You think everything is fine?'
description: CNN's Briana Keilar presses Texas Rep. Chip Roy on the federal coronavirus response after Roy said he wants a second opinion to Dr. Anthony Fauci's and the White House coronavirus task force.

title: Esper in crisis management mode amid turmoil of Trump's reelection campaign
description: On Thursday, Mark Esper will have served exactly one year as secretary of defense but the last few months have been the toughest of his tenure as tensions with the White House have spilled out in public.

title: This couple captured an extremely rare event in their engagement photo
description: A New York couple got engaged under a comet and captured the moment in a spectacular picture.

title: Biden and Trump's cognitive health are in the spotlight
description: CNN's Dr. Sanjay Gupta examines how the cognitive health of both President Donald Trump and presumptive Democratic nominee Joe Biden are playing out as a potential campaign issue in the race for the White House.

title: Video shows party boat patrons celebrating amid pandemic
description: A local judge has spoken out regarding a video of a party boat off of South Padre Island, Texas, as the coronavirus pandemic continues to plague the US.

title: Russian goalkeeper, 16, makes remarkable recovery after being struck by lightning
description: Russian goalkeeper Ivan Zaborovsky, 16, has made a remarkable recovery after he was struck by lightning during a training session earlier this month.

title: Orlando Bloom says his missing dog, Mighty, is dead and reveals a tribute tattoo
description: After a grueling seven-day search, Orlando Bloom says his dog, Mighty, is dead.

title: US conducts airstrike against ISIS in Somalia
description: The US military conducted an airstrike in Somalia on Tuesday targeting ISIS fighters that had attacked US-backed local forces that were being advised by US troops.

title: Beijing called the move an 'unprecedented escalation'
description: • Trump blasts Beijing in public, but privately his properties import tons of Chinese goods

title: Airlines appeal for coronavirus testing to restore transatlantic flights
Twenty-three abducted children, aged from 3 months to 15 years, rescued from a house in southern Mexico
description: Twenty-three children have been rescued after being abducted and forced to sell handicrafts in a tourist town in southern Mexico.

title: Vivienne Westwood suspends herself in giant birdcage to protest Assange's extradition
description: Fashion designer Vivienne Westwood has made a high-profile plea to halt Julian Assange's possible extradition to the US by suspending herself in a giant birdcage outside Britain's central criminal court Tuesday.

title: 'El Chapo' waits for his ticket out of jail
description: Just one year ago, Joaquin "El Chapo" Guzman, the former most powerful and dangerous kingpin in the world, was sentenced to life in prison, plus 30 years.

title: Painting an airplane: Why every layer counts
description: Airlines are some of the most recognized brands in the world, and there's no better billboard for them than the fuselage of their own aircraft.

title: US defense chief pushes allied effort to challenge China
description: United States Defense Secretary Mark Esper said Tuesday that Washington is counting on Asian partners to help rein in an increasingly aggressive China, as two of the US Navy's most powerful warships conducted drills with allies in the Indian and Pacific oceans.

title: 5 ways to get your kids to wear masks
The EU struck a big rescue deal on Covid-19. But it might have dealt a blow to democracy.
description: Brussels began the week in celebratory mood, as member states of the European Union finally agreed how they would distribute around $2 trillion of funds across the bloc over the next seven years.

title: Sick of working from home? Work at a hotel instead
Beijing reacts to closure of Houston consulate
description: Beijing has accused Washington of ordering China to "cease all operations and events" at its consulate in Houston, Texas. The US said the consulate was directed to close "in order to protect American intellectual property and Americans' private information." CNN's Ivan Watson reports.

title: Preliminary magnitude 7.8 earthquake strikes off coast of Alaska
description: An earthquake with a preliminary magnitude of 7.8 struck off the coast of Alaska early Wednesday morning.

title: House to vote Wednesday on removing Confederate statues
description: Lawmakers in the House are expected to vote on legislation Wednesday to expel Confederate statues from the US Capitol.

title: US returns to 1,000 coronavirus deaths in a day and officials warn pandemic will only get worse
Country of 12.5M has only 5 Covid deaths
description: Densely-populated Rwanda is emerging as one nation that has effectively managed coronavirus. But its success dealing with the pandemic began long before the virus emerged. CNN's Stephanie Busari reports.

title: Stern warnings issued to fans amid Liverpool's historic trophy presentation
description: Manager Jurgen Klopp has likened it to the eager anticipation of opening presents on Christmas Day, but Liverpool fans have been urged to stay at home ahead of the team's trophy presentation at Anfield on Wednesday.

title: More than a dozen mayors join Portland in asking Trump administration to withdraw federal forces
description: More than a dozen mayors have joined Portland in asking the Trump administration to remove federal forces from or stop plans to send them to major American cities.

title: See how Trump responded when asked about Ghislaine Maxwell
description: President Donald Trump says he wished Ghislaine Maxwell, the onetime girlfriend and alleged accomplice of accused sex-trafficker Jeffrey Epstein, well.

title: Coronavirus study reveals nearly one in four people in India's capital may have contracted the virus
description: Nearly one in four residents in the Indian capital of New Delhi may have been infected with the novel coronavirus, antibody tests on a random sample of people has shown.

title: Promising vaccine gets the 'real test' in African country
description: The initial results for the Oxford vaccine have been promising, but researcher say the real test for the experimental vaccine will come in South Africa. CNN's David McKenzie goes inside the Johannesburg arm of the study, where scientists are trying to enroll 2,000 participants in the middle of the Covid-19 pandemic.

title: Former Starbucks employee arrested for allegedly spitting in police officers' drinks
description: A former New Jersey Starbucks employee has been arrested after allegedly spitting in the drinks of law enforcement officers, according to a news release.

title: 11 billion years of history in one map: Astrophysicists reveal largest 3D model of the universe ever created
description: A global consortium of astrophysicists have created the world's largest three-dimensional map of the universe, a project 20 years in the making that researchers say helps better explain the history of the cosmos.

title: One of the original 'Rosie the Riveters' is now making masks to help defeat coronavirus
description: One of the original "Rosie the Riveters" is serving her country once more.

title: Ex-White House coordinator lists Trump's 3 'big mistakes' on virus
description: CNN's Don Lemon talks to former White House Ebola response coordinator Ron Klain about the Trump administration's mistakes on the handling of coronavirus compared to Europe.

title: Doctor explains why he did not use swabs on 2 patients who later died
description: Doctor Frank LoVecchio tells CNN's John Berman that due to an ongoing supply shortage, he and his staff ration swabs and other items while seeing Covid-19 patients.

title: What is QAnon? CNN's John Avlon explains
description: CNN's John Avlon explains what fringe conspiracy theory QAnon is and its ties to the GOP party, Republican candidates, and President Donald Trump.

title: At his first coronavirus briefing since April, Trump repeats a handful of classic false claims
description:
• A lesson for the US on masks from the world
• See video of Trump just hours after mask tweet
• US returns to 1,000 Covid-19 deaths in a day
• Texas Covid-19 hot spot faces 'record-breaking' number of patients
